entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
